body_html:
Ah yes, looks like this is not the recommended image. The recommended one is which is coming from the Detectron Dockerfile - https://github.com/facebookresearch/Detectron/blob/master/docker/Dockerfile.

What command were you using to build caffe2 initially?

body:
Ah yes, looks like this is not the recommended image. The recommended one is which is coming from the Detectron Dockerfile - https://github.com/facebookresearch/Detectron/blob/master/docker/Dockerfile. 

What command were you using to build caffe2 initially?
